Name: Cerberus
Equipment_Options: Models in this Formation are equipped with the Three Heads of Hell.

Unit_Abilities.Ability_Effect: Any attack that targets this model is treated as having a Rend Characteristic of 0.

Each time this model slays an enemy model with its Three Heads of Hell it may immediately make D3 additional attacks with its Three Heads of Hell, these additional attacks may not trigger any further attacks.
